00029 #ifndef _MUX_ASYNC_AF_H_
00030 #define _MUX_ASYNC_AF_H_
00031 
00032 #include "muxBase.h"
00033 
00034 class   muxAsyncAF: public muxBase {
00035 typedef muxBase baseclass;
00036 public:
00037                 muxAsyncAF()
00038                 {       serviceCompleted = (tim_typ) -1;
00039                 }
00040         void    early(event *);
00041         void    late(event *);
00042         void    restim();
00043 
00044         tim_typ serviceCompleted;
00045 
00046         inline  tim_typ nextServiceTime();
00047         void    addpars();      // read a non-integer service time (if present)
00048 
00049         double  doubleServiceTime;
00050         tim_typ delta_short;
00051         tim_typ delta_long;
00052         double  bucket;
00053         double  splash;
00054 
00055 };
00056 
00057 inline  tim_typ muxAsyncAF::nextServiceTime()
00058 {
00059         if (serviceTime != 0)   // integer service time
00060                 return serviceTime;
00061 
00062         if ((bucket += splash) >= 1.0)
00063         {       bucket -= 1.0;
00064                 return delta_short;
00065         }
00066         return delta_long;
00067 }
00068 
00069 #endif  // _MUX_ASYNC_AF_H_
